ygData.subject: Telescope and Collapsable Fishing Pole
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya guys, Well, I have good news and bad news.  The good news is the Telescope Lens and Collapsable Fishing Pole CAN be made.  And, you DO have to use a
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya guys,

Well, I have good news and bad news. The good news is the Telescope Lens and Collapsable Fishing Pole CAN be made. And, you DO have to use a collapsable fishing pole to make the telescope. Both of these items are makeable.

Now for the bad news. The only person I know that can make them WILL NOT share the recipe! Can you believe that? He is a gnome on Xegony by the name of Salvadori, so if you can pry the recipe from him, good luck. I tried. Well, also, he said that Tinkering skill improvement had been fixed, and he was up in the 60's on skill. So keep tinkering.

Xalastile
Level 22 Magician
Xegony
